name: clipboard-merge-for-visual-studio-code
displayName: External Clipboard Merge for VS Code
description: Opens an external merge tool to compare the active editor content with the clipboard content.

commands.title: Merge Active File with Clipboard in External Tool

configuration.title: External Clipboard Merge for VS Code

externalMerge.toolPath.description: Full path to the external merge tool executable (e.g., C:\Program Files\Beyond Compare 4\BCompare.exe or /usr/bin/meld).

externalMerge.toolArguments.description: Command line arguments for the merge tool. Use placeholders: {filePath1} (active editor), {filePath2} (clipboard content), {outputFilePath} (where merged content should be saved). Adjust for your tool.

externalMerge.useThreeWayMergeIfBaseProv.description: If true, and a base file argument {baseFilePath} is included in toolArguments, the original active editor file will be copied to a temporary location to act as the base. Tool arguments should then be like: {baseFilePath} {filePath1_modified_temp} {filePath2_clipboard_temp} /output="{outputFilePath_final}"
